titles.title: Commending the Florida Atlantic University Owls for their historic win in the 2007 R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl.
Commending the Florida Atlantic University Owls for their historic win in the 2007 R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Commends the Florida Atlantic University Owls for their historic win in the 2007 R+L Carriers New Orleans Bowl.
Recognizes the achievements of the players, coaches, students, and support staff who were instrumental in the Owls' victory and their continued success as a football program.
